item.author: timothy.lin@alumni.ubc.ca (Timothy Lin)
item.description: The Effect of Migrant Diversity on Household’s Consumption Patterns code{white-space: pre;} The Effect of Migrant Diversity on Household’s Consumption Patterns Timothy Lin 6 July 2017 Background & Motivation The share of foreign born in the U.S. has seen a sharp increase from 1970 to 2010 Background & Motivation There is also substantial variation in the diversity and intensity of migrant inflow across counties How do these settlement patterns shape local communities and preferences?
